# SimTextGen
A generator for scenario file for EuroScope 

# Example
This is an example for ZSAM.

Routes.txt: (For generator airplanes on the ground)    
```
ZSAQ CHH7681 B738 (SAMAS J200 P469 H81 GYA A599 POU G471 PLT W19 OSONO H46 KHN H24 P263 H2 JDZ J625 PA) FL351 SAMAS9YD
ZBAA CCA1153 B738 (LJG A470 DPX A593 DALIM W157 AVBOX) FL361 FQG91D
ZYTL CDG8795 B738 (LJG B221 SUPAR V73 JTN W116 PK G455 HSH V2 ODULO B221 XDX W174 FD W172 IGDEG W173 NIXEP) FL331 FQG91D
ZUUU HXA8344 B738 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 SHL A461 YIN G586 QP B330 ELKAL W179 XYO W25 FJC) FL401 TEB91D
ZGHA CXA8333 B738 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 LIG) FL321 TEB91D
ZYHB CCA1233 B738 (LJG B221 SUPAR V73 JTN W116 PK G455 HSH V2 ODULO B221 XDX W174 FD W172 TEKAM V68 DOBGA W202 UDETI A588 NULRA W206 LARUN) FL371 FQG91D
ZJHK CHH1273 B738 (TEBON A470 MAGOG A1 CH A202 ISBIG W605 DOMGO) FL276 TEB91D
ZSJN CSC7692 A321 (LJG A470 DPX A593 ABTUB) FL331 FQG91D
ZSQD HXA7813 B738 (LJG B221 SUPAR V73 JTN W116 PK G455 HSH V2 ODULO B221 IDVEL) FL331 FQG91D
ZHCC CSZ1125 A319 (LJG A470 SAPIN W95 UPLEL R343 HFE B208 FYG W596 UNTEL) FL331 FQG91D
ZSSS CSC8914 A319 (LJG B221 SUPAR) FL266 FQG91D
ZSPD CCA1723 B737 (LJG B221 PAMVU V74 BK) FL266 FQG91D
ZSNB CSZ8742 B738 (LJG B221 SHZ) FL246 FQG91D
ZULS TBA3192 A319 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO W25 FJC W530 ZW W531 CZH B213 IGELA W522 IGDAG) FL341 TEB91D
ZLLL CSC1874 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO B330 BESMI) FL341 TEB91D
ZPPP CSC1998 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 LXI) FL341 TEB91D
ZSOF CSZ7645 B738 (LJG A470 SAPIN W95 UPLEL R343 MADUK) FL276 FQG91D
ZUBJ CXA8719 B738 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 QNX) FL341 TEB91D
ZBOW CXA1162 B738 (LJG A470 SAPIN W95 UPLEL R343 HFE B208 TYN W87 GODON B215 LEBOM W104 HDS) FL401 FQG91D
ZBCD CXA1981 B738 (LJG A470 DPX A593 DALIM W142 YQG V31 LADIX B339 SOTMU G212 MUDAM) FL401 FQG91D
ZYCC CSH1728 B738 (LJG B221 SUPAR V73 JTN W116 PK G455 HSH V2 ODULO B221 XDX W174 FD W172 TEKAM V68 DOBGA W202 UDETI A588 LEMOT) FL401 FQG91D
ZUUU CES9829 B738 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO W25 FJC) FL401 TEB91D
ZUCK CES7123 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 SJG G586 LAGEX W182 AGTIS W3 QJG) FL401 TEB91D
ZUDC TBA2713 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO W25 WLY W162 SB) FL401 TEB91D
ZBDT CCA6671 A321 (LJG A470 DPX A593 DALIM W157 BEKDO W61 AMVOG G212 PINAP W631 SAKRI B458 VIGEK) FL401 FQG91D
ZSSS CSH8954 A319 (LJG B221 SUPAR) FL266 FQG91D
ZSPD CSZ1423 B737 (LJG B221 PAMVU V74 BK) FL266 FQG91D
ZSNB CSZ8982 B738 (LJG B221 SHZ) FL246 FQG91D
ZULS TBA3091 A319 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO W25 FJC W530 ZW W531 CZH B213 IGELA W522 IGDAG) FL341 TEB91D
ZLLL CSC1091 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 GYA B330 ELKAL W179 XYO B330 BESMI) FL341 TEB91D
ZPPP CSC1998 A321 (TEBON A470 BEBEM R200 GLN W22 IDUMA A461 SHL G471 POU A599 LXI) FL341 TEB91D
ZSOF CSH1715 B738 (LJG A470 SAPIN W95 UPLEL R343 MADUK) FL276 FQG91D
```

Pos.txt (For approach)  
```
CES1123 3000 N024.39.24.281:E118.07.06.661 NULL (XLN AM111 AM103) ZSPD FL276 B737
CES1124 3000 N024.28.46.898:E117.54.42.503 NULL (AM111 AM103) ZSZS FL256 B737
CES1125 3000 N024.45.20.350:E118.13.54.256 NULL (XLN AM111 AM103) ZSWZ FL118 B737
```
